website_summaries.verdict: If you want a basic, no-frills cowbell, this is a good option. However, it may not stand up to heavy use.
pros: This versatile cowbell can be mounted to a drum kit or used handheld
Produces a high tone with a good amount of sustain
Comes at a low price, which is perfect if you're on a budget
cons: The included mallet is of poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Will Ferrell isn't the only one who needs 'more cowbell'
customer_reviews.text: Ever since my daughter saw Will Ferrell playing the cowbell, it's been a joke; synonymous with 'do your own thing'. She recently did things her way and it payed off handsomely. To celebrate this, I bought her a cowbell. It sounds great, comes complete and I know every time she looks at it or plays it, she'll feel my undying (albeit goofy...) support. It's as pictured, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this purchase to others.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Polk

customer_reviews.title: The bell is great, exactly what I was hoping it would be
customer_reviews.text: The bell is great, exactly what I was hoping it would be. Nice tone and volume. However, I recommend NOT relying on the stick/striker provided. It is very anemic, and in fact like other reviewers mention, the stick arrived broken. The seller was not helpful in replacing just the stick. Except for the broken stick, I would have provided a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: zilker_cove

customer_reviews.title: More Cowbell Indeed!
customer_reviews.text: This IS an instrument with that beautiful, LOUD, full cowbell tone. It's attractive and sturdy but, most importantly, it's what you expect to hear in, say, a Blue Oyster Cult song. I was happy with the mallet but I must say the dowel rod is quite thin in diameter. I wish they'd gone with a thicker dowel. Otherwise, it's fine. The mounting bracket appears to be strong enough to attach to a drum set. I tried playing it "hand held." At first, I wished for a handle but, after playing, I realized that you can actually manipulate the tone and volume by changing your grip. No, there is no clapper. Not needed. Very pleased with this. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: scott37040

customer_reviews.title: Loved the cowbell which I bought for my daughter with ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were an easier way to email the vendor... Loved the cowbell which I bought for my daughter with Down syndrome as a music therapy tool,,, BUT the drum stick was literally in four pieces and unusable. I would really like if they could send a replacement drumstick.
customer_reviews.author: Keston

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Because it's a smaller bell it is higher in pitch than bigger ones - but it still has a great sound and of course you can vary that sound a lot by how you hold it, and where and with what you hit it - even your fingertips work. A useful instrument for any percussion needs! Unfortunately because of poor packing, the mallet was broken when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: The Lawn RangerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Do you have a cowbell deficiency? Do you need more cowbell?
customer_reviews.text: This cowbell does it's job of ringing when percussed. I was surprised by how many cowbells were being sold as instruments when they were not intended to be used that way. This is designed as the cowbell instrument, not as a bell that is placed on a cow. It comes with a stick. We can't get enough cowbell at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Schmedes

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely something any person needs if they need a cowbell! I wouldn’t really recommend the mallet that comes with it and to actually use a drumstick. Mine hasn’t broken but it’s frail body won’t last long against the cowbell. I love the design and look of the cowbell and makes it more unique!
customer_reviews.author: GingeRPG

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous with cool sound!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! the sound is cool and it is gorgeous. As a music teacher, this will be a hit with the kids, and the price was right. Nice musical quality!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's a cowbell.
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy cowbell, it was a birthday present for my daughter. Why she wanted it, no idea. It recovering works how you'd expect: the stick his the cowbell, and it's the sound that makes Christopher Walken proud. I rate my judgement one star, however, because after 20 seconds of hearing the cowbell, I REALLY wanted to return it. But, it's a good quality cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Hfuhruhurr

customer_reviews.title: We needed more cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 11 yr old's Halloween costume but have added it to his drum kit because of the high quality. I did sew some felt around the beater/stick because the sound was too tinny, now sound is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good loud sound
customer_reviews.text: The cowbell is fine. I'm glad I read the review about the stick and bought a better on with this purchase. The stick wasn't broken but is very flimsy and the ball falls off the stick. Thanks for the cat toy anyway, she loves batting that ball around.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Flurry

customer_reviews.title: We no longer need more cowbell.
customer_reviews.text: Oh lord. I thought it was a funny idea to get this for my wife for Christmas.... the only saving grace is she is light-years better looking than he is when she's thump-thump-thumping that thing in my general direction. Next Christmas, I"ll get her some Gold Plated diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Rhythm Band cowbell
customer_reviews.text: I did something that I rarely do! I purchased this cowbell without testing it out first! Pleasant surprize! Copper 4.5 inches long, with a grey-black "hammered paint" finish. Nice sound, so if your playing Led Zeppelins, communication breakdown or War's Lowrider or just need more cowbell , this one's for you. Its a fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.author: Back2d50's

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a little high for me. I'll get another one but I'll keep this for variety. Good quality metal. Throw away the mallet that's just silly and use a real drumstick.
customer_reviews.author: SSR Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and loud with a good tone and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SavannahBanana

customer_reviews.title: When you need more cowbell :^)
customer_reviews.text: Bruce Dickenson should approve this because everything's better with a little more cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Emmel

customer_reviews.title: Cured
customer_reviews.text: My fever was cured due to the amount of cowbell I was hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Reviews 1st, sound quality when in hand 1st
customer_reviews.text: Rookie user. Satisfied so far. If sounds are off I'll exchange asap. It's all about the rhythm to the body. Read reviews they helpedme.
customer_reviews.author: ARRAKIS-303

customer_reviews.title: Always More Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at work. We all celebrate when a new sale goes on the board and who doesn't want more cowbell. The office loves it.
customer_reviews.author: alynspace

customer_reviews.title: am happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: *Christine's husband here* Seems sturdy, I plan to shoot it with my pellet rifles to get the DING sounds when I hit it
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This Bell Sings!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been experimenting with different percussion & sounds this rings true.
customer_reviews.author: A REAL BOOMER

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sound change when struck on different parts of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not enough sound change when struck on different parts of the bell. Try looking at "bongo bells" for use as a percussion instrument. But it is low priced and well made.
customer_reviews.author: A geek

customer_reviews.title: I love the sound of the cowbell
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound of the cowbell. I got this for my grandson who had never heard of this “instrument “. He also loves it! Nothing negative to say about it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, however
customer_reviews.text: More cowbell! The sound is great, however, after only 4 bangs the head went flying off the knocker and we had to use a wooden spoon instead. Need to pick up some crazy glue, but other than that it's fine.....
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kreydick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this! They got over on me!
customer_reviews.text: Prime delivery showed up a week late and the stick was already broken when I opened it! What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good, but a small chip of veneer is obvious ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, but a small chip of veneer is obvious at its edge. I imagine with time corrosion may occur. But I needed it for a gift, no time to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: caplover

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little "rougher" product that I would have liked for children, but will work okay
customer_reviews.author: RosaLee

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad Quality, but Mallet is missing.
customer_reviews.text: My cowbell did not come with the mallet. The description says the mallet is included. I would either like my money back or a new mallet sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great cowbell for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son to add on to his drum set. Sounds great and was able to attach to his existing drum set. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: dara

customer_reviews.title: It's the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a fever, and there is only one cure . . . . more cowbell please. It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Maui Me

customer_reviews.title: NO STICK!
customer_reviews.text: Where’s my stick? The picture showed a stick. I chose this item because I thought it came with a stick. BUMMER. NOW I’ll never win America’s Got Talent.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: The cowbell was said to arrive December 1 along with ...
customer_reviews.text: The cowbell was said to arrive December 1 along with another item and wasn't in the box. So far I have found no way to claim a missing item or have it replaced, so I assume I just paid $12 for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Whitni Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Major problem with this product
customer_reviews.text: Something needs to be done. It seems that a lot of people are receiving the same broken piece. What's the problem!!
customer_reviews.author: this game is really fun and challenging

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing quality for the price. You can attach it if you are playing in a band or just use by hand in a rhythm instrument set.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Stott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound -- lives up to the recommendation for "more cowbell!"
customer_reviews.author: mello_conn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 * but it was missing the mallet.
customer_reviews.author: michelle l. lopez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, clear
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, clear, ring. Great price. Prompt delivery. Exactly what I wanted for my music class. Nice heavy weight. Not a toy but a real musical instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Another Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive Cow Bell. great for keeping timing, rhythm etc.. Arrived Fast and in great boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Joze

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive the cow bell, only the wood striking piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: We Need More Cowbells in the World
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding cowbell!! I used this cowbell in my classes to help demonstrate MI theory. Students (college) love it!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: gotta have more...cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from a small bell. Rest of the band can hear it over our raucously loud guitars and drums.
customer_reviews.author: TheDudeAbides

customer_reviews.title: Broken part
customer_reviews.text: The stick you play with was broken when arrived today
customer_reviews.author: Denise Godejohn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly. It was exactly what I wanted, I'm extremely pleased. It was packaged well, and was in perfect shape when it got here.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broken Mallet
customer_reviews.text: Mallet was delivered in pieces and this product is not returnable. Not happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Frank

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty awesome, but when it came the wooden stick ...
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty awesome,but when it came the wooden stick that you use to play it was broken into 4 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Loud but good
customer_reviews.text: With the drums, tambourines and shakers all going at once the bell fits in nice to keep the beat going.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Roach

customer_reviews.title: Good Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cowbell as far as cowbells go !
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the bell but am upset that the stick is broken
customer_reviews.author: Debi Hickingbottom

customer_reviews.title: good bell, no mallet
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed that the mallet wasn't included as listed at time of purchase, and as pictured. nice bell though.
customer_reviews.author: GRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: but hit it once you will agree that it is a darn good cowbell.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be.. but hit it once you will agree that it is a darn good cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that one could adjust the tone of the bell, The size was managable
customer_reviews.author: Reva Schell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a low price!! "We need more cowbell!"
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: You can get quite a few different sounds with one cowbell, I have learned. Perfect for annoying your family, if they have no sense of humor. Very sturdy, good quality. 10/10 would annoy family again.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the fact that a piece came out broken !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing quality cowbell
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing quality cowbell. I bought it for my boyfriend. He used it to make a Snapchat video that got thousands of views on Chicago snapchat. It's seriously awesome. tempted to buy one for myself. :)
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and Good price
customer_reviews.text: I use it for Guitar Voyager! videos that require little hand instruments . It sounds as good as any cowbell I have heard and is a great tool to hand off to other folks if you have a guitar so they can join in on the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Ascher

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We're a musical family. Always saying, "More cow bell" as a joke. So I bought this for my son's birthday. Now he can jam with the fam and ham it up like Will Ferrell. He has the gift, what can I say? haha.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Howard

customer_reviews.title: Need more cowbell
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cowbell and it works. Trust me, our daughter is percussion in the band. I’m no professional cowbell evaluator, but this one seems fine. The finish is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
